name: FQuartzQuantizationBoundary
doc: struct used to specify the quantization boundary of an event

Multiplier: how many "Resolutions" to wait before the onset we care about
bFireOnClockStart: If this is true and the Clock hasn't started yet, the event will fire immediately when the Clock starts
bCancelCommandIfClockIsNotRunning: If this is true, this command will be canceled if the Clock is stopped or otherwise not running
bResetClockOnQueued: If this is true, queueing the sound will also call a Reset Clock command
bResumeClockOnQueued: If this is true, queueing the sound will also call a Resume Clock command
